SELECT USER.PICTURE AS USERPICTURE, USER.NAME AS USERNAME, CONCAT(MONTH(PRAYER.TIME),'월 ',DAY(PRAYER.TIME),'일') AS TIME, PRAYER.BACK AS BACK, PRAYER.TEXT AS TEXT, PRAYER.ID AS ID, PRAYER.USER AS USERID, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM PRAY WHERE PRAYER = PRAYER.ID) AS PRAYCOUNT, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM REPLY WHERE PRAYER = PRAYER.ID AND (PUBLIC = 'Y' OR USER = #id# OR USER.ID = #id#) ) AS REPLYCOUNT, (SELECT MAX(TIME) FROM PRAY WHERE PRAYER = PRAYER.ID AND USER=#id#) AS LASTPRAYED, SCRAP.ID AS SCRAPD, PRAYER.TIME AS RAW_TIME, REPLACE( REPLACE( CONCAT( MONTH( PRAYER.TIME ) , '월 ', DAY( PRAYER.TIME ) , '일 ', DATE_FORMAT( PRAYER.TIME, '%p %h:%i' ) ) , 'AM', '오전' ) , 'PM', '오후' ) AS LONG_TIME FROM PRAYER LEFT OUTER JOIN USER ON PRAYER.USER = USER.ID LEFT OUTER JOIN SCRAP ON PRAYER.ID = SCRAP.PRAYER AND SCRAP.USER=#id# WHERE PRAYER.USER = #searchId# AND PRAYER.TEAM = -1
AND PRAYER.COMPLETED = 'Y'
ORDER BY PRAYER.IDX DESC
SELECT TEAM.PICTURE, TEAM.NAME, TEAM.ID FROM MEMBER LEFT OUTER JOIN TEAM ON MEMBER.TEAM = TEAM.ID WHERE MEMBER.USER = #id# AND MEMBER.STATE = 'J'
